plot outline: There is an important place for matrimonial in Indian society. After marriage, the first night of honeymoon is must there along with great excitement and nervousness too. 'Aatpadi Nights' tells us about the excitement, nervousness and the ignorance of the first night of marriage. Vasant Khatmode (Vashya) is the hero of the film who is also very excited but he has doubts as other grooms, due to lack of knowledge of the first night of the Honeymoon. He loves very much of his becoming wife and he is very excited and nervous for a honeymoon. Due to this phobia, he goes to his friends to clear the doubts about the first night. The friends give advice and the drama of the story is started here - senseless advice given by friends and the ignorance put Vashya into great trouble. Alimentally the first night of the honeymoon in his life goes bitterly horrible and terrible. After that night Vashya's life is changed and the private issue becomes public. This is what the spicy and the interesting story of 'Aatpadi Nights'.
